name: Birmingham
description: Sophisticated downtown living meets upscale suburban charm. Birmingham offers a walkable community with premier shopping, dining, and parks.

name: Bloomfield Hills
description: Exclusive estates and rolling hills define this prestigious community. Known for world-class architecture and the Cranbrook Educational Community.
